1.title: Let Sha'Carri Run!
1.subtitle: Sign the petition to reinstate Sha'Carri Richardson and allow this world-class athlete to compete in the 100-meter dash! And revisit the outdated rules around marijuana and athletes.

1.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
1.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

2.title: Kids Swag
2.subtitle: Great action is taking place to improve diversity in books and dolls and there are a number of different vendors making it easier to find these great items. But what about everything else in your child's world? You go grocery shopping, what image is on the cute plate and cup set your child wants? You're want to encourage their creativity, what images are in their colouring books? You're throwing a birthday party, what are your options?
2.moreInfo: The list can go on and on. It is an unnecessarily complicated task to source and purchase everyday lifestyle products for children that have black images. These companies exist but one must be internet savvy and social media literate to find them. KIDS SWAG was launched in December 2016 to make it easy for parents to build environments that are reflective of their child's beauty.

products.name: Nia Ballerina Backpack
products.description: This beautifully illustrated pink rucksack is the perfect accessory for your little ballerina, which is both lightweight and practical with plenty of storage. Made from durable and water-resistant material this rucksack features a colourful design with two images of Nia Ballerina on the front.

products.name: Nana Yaa
products.description: Nana means Queen or King in West Africa , Ghana. The founders of Nana Dolls wanted to teach the younger generation of their history whilst also having fun. There were many strong courageous women from all over Africa who helped to fight for freedom.

products.name: Super Friends Onesie
products.description: Your little Superhero featured as your favourite Superhero.

2.title: Intersectionality Matters! Podcast
2.subtitle: Intersectionality Matters! is a podcast hosted by Kimberlé Crenshaw, an American civil rights advocate and a leading scholar of critical race theory.

3.title: Coily and Cute
3.subtitle: Sharee has loved art all her life and has taken every opportunity to study it. She runs one of the Black-owned companies where customers can buy art prints.

3.title: Harvard student penned textbook on racial literacy
3.subtitle: Winona Guo '22 co-authored a book on race, culture, and identity as a resource for teachers.

4.title: Pod For The Cause Podcast
4.subtitle: The Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights launched "Pod for the Cause" to expand the conversation on the critical civil and human rights challenges of our day. Through this expanded dialogue, we want to spur activism that drives change in our communities and country.

4.title: A.O. Hamer
4.subtitle:
Hey, I'm Aramis and I love color!

My acrylic paintings are inspired by divine femininity, music, higher consciousness, and the cosmos. Liberation is my life's work- to free myself from the chains that could hold me back mentally, physically, and spiritually. My paintbrush reminds me of the creative power I have within the canvas - and life. As I take this journey to freedom, I hope to inspire others along the way.

5.title: Smile Natural Products
5.subtitle: After struggling to find an ethical, big-brand hygiene company, Founder and Chief Executive Officer Brian Mays decided to create one with Smile Natural Products.

products.name: Toothpaste Sampler Pack
products.description: Can't choose? Try all four toothpaste flavors and find your favorite! Mint + Charcoal, Cinnamon + Clove, Vanilla + Lavender, Ginger + Turmeric

products.name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
products.description: The Aromatherapy Diffuser scents your home to your mood!  Add our 100%, pure essential oils to this handmade, ceramic diffuser to freshen up any room in your home.

products.name: Lavender Essential Oil
products.description: Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil is a common favorite in aromatherapy use. Lavender is well known for its calming properties, as well as being the most versatile essential oil out there.

5.title: Support the King Center
5.subtitle: The King Center remain committed to proactively educating and training individuals and leaders across all sectors in Nonviolence365 to influence equitable change in our national and global infrastructure.

6.title: Charge the cops who shot Jacob Blake
6.subtitle: Jacob Blake, 29, was shot by Kenosha, Wisconsin police officers in the back 7 times on August 23, 2020. Officers were on the scene due to a fight, which Jacob Blake was trying to break up. The cops who shot him need to be charged.

6.title: Justice for Tete Gulley
6.subtitle: Tete Gulley was a 31 year old queer Black transient. She was also known by some of her family as Otis. She was found hanging from a tree on the evening of May 27th 2019 in Rocky Butte Park. The cause of death was determined to be suicide at the scene but there is evidence of foul play.

7.title: KAZMALEJE
7.subtitle: At KAZMALEJE (pronounced cosmology), we are dedicated to creating innovative, lifestyle-amplifying tools and accessories to improve our customers' hair care and beauty regimens.

products.name: KurlsPlus Paddle Comb
products.description: Our KurlsPlus Paddle Comb is great for detangling all hair types, lengths and thickness. It is the ultimate power tool that will allow you to detangle, blow dry, massage and style all in ONE!

products.name: KurlsPlus Pick
products.description: Our KurlsPlus Pick is great for short cuts or adding volume after a braid out, twist out or roller set. It's the ideal styling companion for travelers or on-the-go curlistas who need to refresh their hair throughout the day.

products.name: KurlsPlus Comb
products.description: Meet our KurlsPlus Comb. Our Comb is great for detangling hair of all lengths that is normal to thick in density with minimal stress on your hair whether wet or dry. It's also great for raking through heat styled curls to create a feathered look or detangling wigs/extensions without disrupting the curl pattern too much resulting in unwanted frizz.

7.title: Civil Rights Act - Britannica
7.subtitle: Civil Rights Act, (1964), comprehensive U.S. legislation intended to end discrimination based on race, colour, religion, or national origin.

8.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
8.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

8.title: Princess Omalie
8.subtitle: Welcome To The Wonderful World Of Princess Omalie Unlock the magic and lore of The kingdom of IgboOrai, Africa’s oldest Monarchy and greatest dynasty of kings and queens! We’ve been waiting for you!

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Gala Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Gala Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coiffed.

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Coronation Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Coronation Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coifed in a rich, soft cape and a smooth silky costume, designed by "Atelier de Babazongo" – dressmakers of the Royal family. As a treat, she holds a special key as your invitation to unlock the magic of her kingdom.

products.name: Princess Omalie, The Coronation And The Polka Dot Lamb
products.description: Princess Omalie of the African kingdom of IgboOrai could be the happiest girl on the planet — except that her family has been under a curse. Unless the curse of the Goliath beetle necklace is lifted, Omalie’s father might die in a horrible freak accident. He might never be crowned king. Omalie worries about her family, and about her own safety; how will she ever lead a peaceful happy life, have friends, and go to school?

9.title: Red Bay Coffee
9.subtitle: Red Bay Coffee is at the forefront of what we believe is the fourth wave of coffee—a firm commitment to ensure coffee production is not only high quality and sustainable, but a vehicle for diversity, inclusion, social and economic restoration, entrepreneurship, and environmental sustainability. We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

products.name: East Fourteenth
products.description: Tanzanian Dark Roast - Blackberry, Dark Chocolate, Date  East Fourteenth is an homage to a past heritage and a link to history in the making. It is the story of Oakland’s wide-reaching cultures and creeds.

products.name: Coffee Mug - Africa's Gift (Black)
products.description: "Coffee Africa's Gift to the World" Coffee Mug - beautiful, stylish, black-on-black design with Red Bay Coffee logo - 12 ounces

products.name: Unisex Sweatshirt - Black Coffee - Black
products.description: Crewneck Sweatshirt - black with black foil print; back Red Bay Coffee logo; 80/20 Poly-Cotton Blend. Locally sourced and screen printed in Oakland, CA.

9.title: 3 ways to speak English
9.subtitle: Jamila Lyiscott is a "tri-tongued orator" in her powerful spoken-word essay "Broken English," she celebrates — and challenges — the three distinct flavors of English she speaks with her friends, in the classroom and with her parents. As she explores the complicated history and present-day identity that each language represents, she unpacks what it means to be "articulate."

10.title: CurlyCoilyTresses
10.subtitle: At CurlyCoilyTresses, we create products that help soothe scalps and moisturize and hydrate hair. We've helped thousands just like you to lengthen and strengthen their hair; soften, moisturize and hydrate their hair; and improve the overall appearance of their hair.

products.name: Enrich Moisturizer Styler + Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil Serum + Nourish Treatment Masque
products.description: Our best selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! It's true! We avoid all fragrances and focus on what really matters, eliminating dryness and getting lasting moisture, even days after wash day!

products.name: Travel + Discovery Enrich Moisturizer Styler + Nourish Treatment Masque
products.description: A top selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! It's true! We avoid all fragrances and focus on what really matters, eliminating dryness and getting lasting moisture, even days after wash day!

products.name: Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil Serum + Enrich Moisturizer Styler
products.description: A top selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! It's true! We avoid all fragrances and focus on what really matters, eliminating dryness and getting lasting moisture, even days after wash day!

10.title: Find Black-owned bookstores near you
10.subtitle: The African American Literature Book Club (AALBC.com) has put together a map of Blac-owned bookstores across the US. Find your nearest one here.

11.title: Classify White Supremacist Groups as Domestic Terrorist Organizations
11.subtitle: Request a new legal requirement to register, classify, and subsequently surveil white supremacist organizations as domestic terrorist organizations. By classifying these groups as intimidating to the American population and dangerous to human life, the institutions responsible for protecting citizens against such groups will have the necessary information and resources to prevent further destruction carried out by these violent terrorist groups.

11.title: What If I Don't Move to the Back of the Bus?
11.subtitle: Rosa Parks brought together a unique blend of life experiences, a commitment to racial justice, and a flawless reputation to transform a single act of defiance into a defining moment for the modern American civil rights movement.

12.title: Martin Luther King, Jr: 7 Surprising Facts
12.subtitle: In his 39 years (1929-1968) Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. became one of the leading figures in the civil rights movement.

12.title: Derek Chauvin Is Sentenced To 22 1/2 Years For George Floyd's Murder
12.subtitle: A Minnesota judge sentenced Derek Chauvin to 22 1/2 years in prison for the murder of George Floyd — a punishment that exceeds the state's minimum guidelines but falls short of prosecutors' request of a 30-year sentence.

13.title: Just Mercy: A Story of Justice and Redemption
13.subtitle: An unforgettable true story about the potential for mercy to redeem us, and a clarion call to end mass incarceration in America — from one of the most inspiring lawyers of our time.

13.title: Fewer Cards
13.subtitle: Fewer Cards is a touchless smart card that allows you to express yourself and share who you are with others by exchanging contact information, social media, and data seamlessly. The concept of Fewer Cards started from the fact that exchanging paper business cards is wasteful and cumbersome.

14.title: I Wear African
14.subtitle: I Wear African is a campaign initiative created to promote and celebrate the contemporary African lifestyle by bringing the best quality Afrocentric brands to our fans.

products.name: Hector Rectangular Indoor Lumbar Pillow
products.description: Artfully inspiring and beautiful, the Lumbar Pillow bolsters your home instantly and effortlessly while evoking bohemian style. Made in the USA, the classic rectangular silhouette of the pillow is filled with a feather down insert and is covered with a quality linen blend fabric.

products.name: African Print Dashiki T-Shirt White
products.description: The D’iyanu white dashiki t-shirt is perfect for those hot summer days! Stay cool and look great with this dashiki t-shirt which features an ultra soft feel and unique center front and sleeve details. This will become an instant favorite in your closet, and one of your most worn shirts in the hot summer!

products.name: Women African Print Yellow Long Puff Sleeve Dress
products.description: Handmade, 100% cotton, Afronista dress. Available in sizes 2-14.

14.title: MoreFire! Hot Sauce
14.subtitle: MoreFire! Hot Sauce is a concoction of spicy fiery goodness. For those who are serious about good quality food. We are 1st place nationwide award winning... so get on the winning Team. You need MoreFire! in your life!

products.name: MoreFire! Hot Sauce (Original)
products.description: 5 oz bottle of the multi-award winning Goldson’s MoreFire! Hot Sauce… Ay Yo! I GOT THAT FIRE!

products.name: MoreFire! Pepper Sauce (Louisiana Style)
products.description: 5 oz bottle of the 1st place Award Winning MoreFire! Pepper Sauce… Ay Yo! I GOT THAT FIRE!

products.name: I Got That Fire! T-Shirt – Box block
products.description: I Got That Fire! T-Shirt – Box block

15.title: Brimz Official
15.subtitle: The Brimz culture is a lifestyle choice, we are a community founded on a love for music, fashion and art. We celebrate diverse expression in our great city and a commitment to contributing to our community by supporting the arts. Wherever artistic expression exists, culture and progress are always by its side.

products.name: AJ1 Sneaker Hoodie
products.description: AJ1 inspired limited run

products.name: Classic 6 Cap
products.description: The love for Toronto a.k.a the 6 is real, and we're always repping for the home team. The 6ix cap represents Torontos unique culture and its impact on the world around it. It's alot of love when you're wearing this dad hat, full of the gritty city pride we've grown to love and embrace.

products.name: Blessed Beanie
products.description: Stay blessed all winter long! If winter is your thing then you're truly blessed to not be bothered by the cold, but if that day does come and you need protection the blessed beanie will hold you down.

15.title: Juneteenth Challenges A Narrative About America’s History
15.subtitle: Juneteenth marks the day in 1865 when Union troops arrived in Galveston, Texas, and the enslaved people living there learned of their freedom — more than two years after President Abraham Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation. As such, the day tells a broader story of how emancipation was woefully delayed for Black people enslaved deep in the Confederacy.

16.title: Not all Black people are African American. Here's the difference.
16.subtitle: Black Lives Matter protests have opened up conversations about the history of privilege, racism, and the lived experiences and identities of black people in America. Now, the distinction between "Black" and "African American" has become a prominent conversation on social media.

16.title: QuintesScential Candles
16.subtitle: Since we love burning scented candles, we decided to embark on our journey of becoming Black chandlers. We decided, from the beginning, to use only the healthiest ingredients in anything that we make and sell.

products.name: Earthy
products.description: Earthy is a sensual fragrance that lives up to its name. Our Earthy is aromatic, woodsy, and intoxicating, with a prominent sandalwood base, complemented by layers of sage, spice, and amber.

products.name: Sweet Dreams
products.description: Ready for bed? Time to unwind from a hectic day? Escape with gentle notes of lavender on your pillow with the crisp scent of freshly washed linen.

products.name: Pleasantry
products.description: Our Pleasantry is a proven pleaser, combining a patented odor neutralizing technology with a crisp, clean fragrance that brings to mind fresh linens drying on the line. Pleasantry doesn't just cover up unwanted smells, it cancels them out.

17.title: NinetyNine Products
17.subtitle: Our mission is to deliver functional & beautiful product that celebrate the people who help people. 99% of our marketing dollars will spotlight those individuals we believe do more than their fare share of shaping our communities in positive ways.

17.title: Four-year Analysis: Police-related deaths across racial groups
17.subtitle: A four-year research study released on June 24th, 2020 shows that Black Americans were, on average, more than three times as likely as White Americans to be killed during a police encounter.

18.title: Gifts for the Spirit
18.subtitle: An independently run, spiritually driven, boutique for the soul

products.name: Melanated Classic Tarot
products.description: Various races and nationalities practice tarot for healing and education, but it's hard to heal and learn with tools that don't represent you. This deck is a solution to that problem.

products.name: Bel Meditation Candle Set
products.description: The BEL uses fire, gravity, and sound to measure time. When the candle is lit, wax melts and eventually a pin falls, landing with a resonant ding - a beautiful way to end your meditation.

products.name: Small Garnierite Palm Stone
products.description: Known as the stone of the Goddess Gaia, GARNIERITE (also called Green Moonstone), is a rare form of Moonstone used for emotional healing, balance, and freedom.

18.title: Amazing Essence
18.subtitle: Amazing Essence is a Philadelphia based, one-woman small business built on a dream of entrepreneurship. Our handcrafted products are created using 100% soy wax without additives, natural (lead-free) cotton wick and high quality fragrance oils without phthalates or additives.

products.name: 25 oz. Triple Wick Candle Bowl
products.description: The Amazing Essence 25 oz. candle bowls are handcrafted using natural soy wax, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office.

products.name: 4oz. Linen Spray
products.description: Mist our handcrafted linen sprays into the air liberally to Relax, Balance or Uplift your senses. When misting Linen, Spray 7 inches away and only on washable fabric. Contains essential oils/highly quality fragrance oils.

products.name: 8oz. Herbal Candles
products.description: The Amazing Essence 8 oz. herbal candles are handcrafted using natural soy wax, and fused with dried herbs, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office. Approx 40hr of burn time.

19.title: Shades of My Melanin LLC
19.subtitle: At Shades of My Melanin, our goal is to not only offer products that make you feel beautiful in your own skin but to offer products that tell a story for each and every person who wears them. We offer fun, colorful, and creative products that can be worn by all ages.

19.title: Black Lives Matter
19.subtitle: We appreciate your support of the movement and our ongoing fight to end state-sanctioned violence, liberate Black people, and end white supremacy forever.

20.title: How to overcome our biases? Walk boldly toward them
20.subtitle: Our biases can be dangerous, even deadly — as we've seen in the cases of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, and Eric Garner, in Staten Island, New York. Diversity advocate Vernā Myers looks closely at some of the subconscious attitudes we hold toward out-groups. She makes a plea to all people: Acknowledge your biases.

20.title: Namascents Candle Co
20.subtitle: Namascents Candle Co crafts candles and home fragrance products for any space; welcoming peace, stillness and good thoughts. Our inspiration is nature, love + memories. We keep it clean + simple with a scentful twist.

21.title: How students of color confront impostor syndrome
21.subtitle: As a black woman from a tough part of the Bronx who grew up to attain all the markers of academic prestige, Dena Simmons knows that for students of color, success in school sometimes comes at the cost of living authentically. Now an educator herself, Simmons discusses how we might create a classroom that makes all students feel proud of who they are.

21.title: The Weave Zone
21.subtitle: The Weave Zone has high-end and quality adult toys and hair, for prices that you can bare.

products.name: Toni Danaé
products.description: Every doll needs a great LOOSE WAVE unit in her collection!

products.name: Blonde Straight
products.description: 5A Quality  100% Human Hair Bundle | 10"-26"

products.name: GLAM Lashes
products.description: Add vibrancy to your finished look with a pair of GLAM lashes!

22.title: Why Many Americans Can’t See The Wealth Gap Between White And Black America
22.subtitle: In the last year and a quarter, the pandemic has served as a stark reminder of just how unequal America still is. But it also hasn’t been a “reminder” for everyone. Black Americans and other Americans of color didn’t have the luxury of forgetting that American society is unequal.

22.title: Build for Black Lives
22.subtitle: Are you an anti-racist designer, developer, data scientist, or marketing specialist interested in committing to pro bono projects to work towards reparations and racial justice? Work on one of our available projects.

23.title: Why Seeing Yourself Represented on Screen Is So Important
23.subtitle: "Black Panther" has been hailed as a model success story for depicting diversity on screen. According to past research, the representation of minority groups in mass media has a powerful educational impact on audiences.

23.title: Princess Planet
23.subtitle: Princess Planet is a brand of children's entertainment that helps promote characters with diverse hair textures, skin tones, and cultural backgrounds.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 1
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume One is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 2
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume Two is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun.

products.name: Princess Planet: Coloring book
products.description: The Princess Planet Coloring Book showcases sixteen unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

24.title: Diva By Cindy
24.subtitle: Diva is for a woman who wants: Beauty, Excellence and Elegance in her hair. "DIVA" stands for: Divine, Inspired, Virtuous and Annointed. Thank you for using Diva by Cindy... the secret to Longer, Healthier Hair.

products.name: Super-Gro Haridress
products.description: Apply to scalp and temples for thinning hair to promote optimal hair growth. It tingles promoting circulation and healthy hair. Contains Shea Butter, Horse Tail, Menthol and Chamomile. Dry, Itchy, Flaky scalp is a thing of the past.

products.name: Leave-In Detangling Conditioner
products.description: The DIVA BY CINDY Leave-In Detangler eliminates dryness, brittleness, and limpness; and is especially good on over processed, dull hair. Penetrates the hair shaft quickly while detangling and adding sheen making it excellent for fine, limp hair and ideal for wraps and roller sets.

products.name: KURL POP Curl Hydration
products.description: This Leave in formula will leave your curls soft, moisturized and bouncy. Great on all curl types, can be used to define curls, twist and reactivate curls.

24.title: Sienna Sauce
24.subtitle: The award winning Sienna Sauce comes in 3 delicious flavors for every palette. Tangy (the original flavor), Lemon Pepper and Spicy. The Lemon Pepper and Spicy flavors are made with the original flavor being the base of those Sauces. Sienna Sauce has WOWed so many customers, the family based company had to create a subscription program so the Sienna Sauce addicts wouldn’t run out of their favorite sauces.

products.name: Sienna Sauce Variety Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Sienna Sauce 3 Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Digital Sauce Lovers E-Book
products.description: Sienna Sauce has released its first e-cookbook! This digital flavor manual has 4 amazing recipes by celebrity chef, Jabril Riddick, Along with the champion recipe from Sienna Sauce's Virtual Cook-Off.

25.title: Ruth Nathan's
25.subtitle: It is Nicole R. Brown's desire that Ruth Nathan’s does not only make customers look spectacular but feel spectacular as well, positively influencing them to feel better about themselves. It is a known fact that when one dresses well, one feels better—and from an outfit that is well put together, that makes one walk with pride, the Urban Peacock emerges.

products.name: Blue Curved Mask
products.description: Still want to look dapper while protecting yourself and others? We have the answer! Reusable and re-washable, these fabric masks will keep you looking good and doing good. When you buy a curved face mask from Ruth Nathan’s we donate a rectangular face mask to health care professionals and essential workers in need.

products.name: Franc Bleu Bow Tie
products.description: The deep older brother of the Franc Un pattern, the Franc Bleu’s watercolor pen lines convey elegance and a truly historic sense of style. Also inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Bleu carries notes of art deco, dancing under the stars, and midnight.

products.name: Franc Un Pocket Square
products.description: Inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Un pattern gives off a refined yet playful vibe sure to elevate your look during formal occasions. Perfect for when you want to be taken seriously—but not too seriously. Notes of Art Deco, French Quarter jazz, and pistachios.

25.title: All Hip-Hop
25.subtitle:
AllHipHop.com was founded and launched in 1998 by CEO’s "Grouchy" Greg Watkins and Chuck "Jigsaw" Creekmur.

After many years of developing the site, AllHipHop.com has become a valuable resource for hip-hop on the internet, featuring daily news, interviews, reviews, multimedia, a fast growing community and other interesting content.

Publications such as CNN, The Source, XXL, Complex, New York Post, The New York Times and many others cite AllHipHop.com’s news and features due to our accuracy and trustworthiness.

26.title: Racial Literacy: What Does it Mean?
26.subtitle: What is your first memory of racial difference? Unfortunately, our education system doesn’t include a standard explanation to our young people of the history of the creation of the concept of race (or critical race theory). Learn today what you should've in school.

27.title: Kintu New York
27.subtitle: Kintu handbags are designed in New York, co-developed with global artisans, and made in Italy. The Kintu brand appeals to the dynamic, busy, urban woman who values quality and self-expression.

27.title: Plum Good
27.subtitle: Plum Good locally produces, discriminately sources and proudly brings to market the highest quality culinary and restorative spices, herbs and tea blends available. Our mission is to help bring flavorful nutrition available to our customers.  We make All Natural rubs and blends, teas, jams and sauces.

products.name: Paprika Lime Blend
products.description: This SALT FREE blend of citrus, paprika, garlic, and lime gives color, zest, and mouth watering flavor to fish, chicken, and poultry.

products.name: Organic Chai Tea
products.description: Black Tea, Ginger, Cardamom, Cloves, Peppercorns Cinnamon

products.name: Sweet & Hot Chocolate Sauce
products.description: A culinary gourmet delight for cooks and foodies alike! Choice serrano and chocolate peppers, dark chocolate, balsamic vinegar, raw sugar, cardamom and water make a mouthwatering marinade, topping or accompaniment and make everything it comes into contact with delicious.

28.title: Book: Tell Me Who You Are
28.subtitle: A roadmap for cultivation racial literacy by Winona Guo and Priya Vulchi

28.title: StepStitches
28.subtitle: Welcome to StepStitches where you can find unique keepsakes sure to delight. Each item is handmade with love and exquisite care. Both ready to ship and custom made items are available.

products.name: Black Rag Doll - Raggedy Ann Doll
products.description: Cinnamon Annie® is a delightful vintage style doll with a modern twist. This Raggedy Ann style doll is dressed in a pretty floral navy and yellow dress with matching hair bow. Doll dress and hair bow are removable.

products.name: Raggedy Andy Doll - Boy Doll
products.description: Cinnamon Andrew is a fun vintage style doll with a modern twist. This Raggedy Andy style doll is dressed in light blue overalls with a white shirt and dark blue bow tie. Doll clothes are removable.

products.name: Personalized Raggedy Ann Doll
products.description: If you would like a name embroidered on the doll's dress, please choose that option AND write the name or phrase in the Note to Seller box during check-out.  She is Made to Order and will take approximately two weeks to complete before shipping.

29.title: How we can make racism a solvable problem — and improve policing
29.subtitle: When we define racism as behaviors instead of feelings, we can measure it — and transform it from an impossible problem into a solvable one, says justice scientist Dr. Phillip Atiba Goff. In an actionable talk, he shares his work at the Center for Policing Equity, an organization that helps police departments diagnose and track racial gaps in policing in order to eliminate them.

29.title: Automotive Heroes of Black History Month
29.subtitle: Ever wonder what driving would be like without turn signals or traffic lights? Well, without these great inventors, engineers, scientists, and pioneers of their field, driving wouldn’t be what it is today! In celebration of Black History Month, we want to share a few of their exciting stories with you.

30.title: My Beautiful Fluff
30.subtitle: Clothes designed with curves in mind. Each shirt is cut to accommodate curves and fluff with custom to cut to my size chart with sizes L to 5XL.

30.title: AcARRE

31.title: How we're honoring people overlooked by history
31.subtitle: Since its founding in 1851, the "New York Times" has published thousands of obituaries — for heads of state, famous celebrities, even the inventor of the sock puppet. But only a small percentage of them chronicle the lives of women and people of color. In this insightful talk, "Times" editor Amy Padnani shares the story behind "Overlooked," the project she's leading to recognize people from history whose deaths were ignored — and refocus society's lens on who is considered important.
